channel.title: Black Metal
channel.description:
*First off, if you dont like Black metal, please dont post. Because then this thread will turn into a spam fest/flame war.
Ok, I am making a list of Black metal bands. And I need your help completing it. So I ask you to post some bands, and maby a description/review of that band. Viking/Folk metal is counted as Black Metal aswell, so for example Ensiferum would fit into this list.
Ok, the list so far: Ensiferum Finntroll Tyr Catamenia Dimmu Borgir Amon Amarth Celtic Frost Korpiklaani Metsatöll Vintersorg
As you can see, the list is quite short. Partialy (sp?) this is because I want to listen to some new bands, and the ones listed above are bands that I have listened to much, so they get boring (I still like them thoug). Also, no NSBM, I hate fascism and anything related to it.
Thanks in advance!

item.title: Black Metal
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“rockrocks5150, post:11, topic:142583”]Mercyful Fate
one of the first black metal bands[/quote]Ah, who can forget? Mercyful Fate is awesome, and so is King Diamond. Though they play Heavy Metal with black metal lyrics.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Metal
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Anaal Nathrakh, but they play grindcore in a black metal style.
The Axis of Perdition*,
Koldbrann*,
The Meads of Asphodel*, an experimental black metal band.
Venom, for an old band. Not really black, but you might like them.
Immortal,
Burzum,
Kalmah,
Norther, and finally,
Wintersun.

Kind of drifting off into medolic black/death metal so I’ll stop.

  • = Never heard them play but hear good reviews.

Read full topic

yeah i know they’re probably my favorite band

item.title: Black Metal
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

cooper:

CoB can be called death metal… Everytime I Die’s video ends with Alexi getting stabbed by the reaper… idk it just seems death metallish to me… by the way, listen to Trashed, Lost & Strungout, one of their best songs ever =Þ

I love cob. there amazing

Read full topic

item.title: Black Metal
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

MidGuardian:

CoB are not hardcore enough to be death metal. No songs such as “GOD HATES US ALL” from slayer, ahhahahahahaha.

But then, Slayer is Thrash Metal.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Metal
item.dc:creator: @MidGuardian MidGuardian
item.description:

CoB are not hardcore enough to be death metal. No songs such as “GOD HATES US ALL” from slayer, ahhahahahahaha.

item.title: Black Metal
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

I guess Bathory can be that yeah. In my own opinion CoB is Extreme Power/Heavy Metal with harsh vocals. It’s not extreme enough to become death metal or black metal. Most influences are from classic metal.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Metal
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Bathory can be seen as the founder of viking metal right? I’ve seen Marduk live, but I cant remember much of it. And the dutch version of the wikipedia page of CoB stated that they were a Black Metal band, but the english version stated that they were more of a death metal band. So my fault + the translators.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Metal
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Well, Children of Bodom or In Flames wouldn’t fit on the list. CoB is pretty hard to classify, but In Flames is Swedish Death Metal.

Try the following bands:
Unleashed
Bathory (Viking/Black Metal)
Mayhem
Marduk

They are pretty good.

Read full topic

*First off, if you dont like Black metal, please dont post. Because then this thread will turn into a spam fest/flame war.

Ok, I am making a list of Black metal bands. And I need your help completing it. So I ask you to post some bands, and maby a description/review of that band. Viking/Folk metal is counted as Black Metal aswell, so for example Ensiferum would fit into this list.
